content:
HOME PROGRAM REGISTRATION HOTELS, MAPS, & DIRECTIONS ORGANIZING COMMITTEE FOR MORE INFORMATION

REGISTRATION FORM


Please send your registration form and payment to:

Aileen R. Broccardo
Information and Computer Science
University of California, Irvine Phone: +1 949-824-1357
ICS2 Room 110 Fax:     +1 949-824-1715
Irvine, CA 92697-3425 Email:  aileen@ics.uci.edu


Registration: Registration must be received by Tuesday, June 30, 1998.

There will be on-site registration beginning 7:30 am on July 13, 1998, space permitting. We strongly advise advanced registration to guarantee your seat. Space availablity cannot be guarenteed without advanced registration, as our numbers are restricted by the available seats at the venue (100).

Upon registration, a confirmation package will be sent including: a receipt, campus map, parking information and hotel recommendations.


Cancellation/Refund Policy:

Written cancellations received FIVE working days prior to the workshop date are subject to a $50 cancellation fee. Registrants who fail to cancel in writing at least FIVE working days prior to the workshop are liable for the entire fee.


Registration Fees:

Registration
(by 06/30) 		On-site Registration
IRUS Gold Sponsors      $65.00    $115.00
IRUS Silver Sponsors
     Category I      $95.00    $145.00
     Bay Area    $100.00    $150.00
Students      $30.00      $80.00
Non-Sponsors    $125.00    $175.00
